metadata.title: MindFrame Terminal - Emotional Hedging Protocol for Traders
metadata.description: Risk Management Software. AI helps manage Tilt and FOMO through binaural modulation.

hero.title: Risk Management for Your Brain
hero.subtitle: The first emotional hedging protocol for traders. AI helps manage Tilt and FOMO through binaural modulation.

problem.title: The Market Punishes
problem.bad1: Got stopped out at -5%? Pulse at 120, you open x20 leverage to 'get it back'. Result: Liquidation.
problem.bad2: Price drops 2% on correction. You panic sell the bottom before the pump. Result: Missed gains.
problem.good1Title: Flat market, but you hunt for trades
problem.good1: Burning your deposit on fees and stupid entries. Result: Slow portfolio death.
problem.good2: 95% of traders lose not because of bad strategy. They can't control brain biochemistry under stress.

solution.title: This Is Not Meditation.
solution.description: MindFrame is a 'red button' for your brain. When you lose control — launch the protocol.

step1.title: Frequency Shift
step1.description: Binaural beats switch brain from High-Beta (panic) to Alpha/Theta. In 3 minutes you physically won't be able to stress.

step2.title: Whale Voice
step2.description: AI generates an authoritative voice with lowered timbre — the voice of someone who manages billions. Subconscious obeys.

step3.title: Contextual Scripts
step3.description: Not mantras. Hard commands: 'Accept the loss', 'Hands off the keyboard', 'Hold the position'.

sos.name: SOS / STOP-LOSS
sos.when: Got stopped out and want revenge
sos.effect: Complete hysteria shutdown. Accepting loss as cost of business.

diamond_hands.name: DIAMOND HANDS
diamond_hands.when: Asset pumping, scared. Hand reaching to close before target.
diamond_hands.effect: Strengthened discipline. Focus on long-term goal.
diamond_hands.result: You take the full move, not just 5%.

market_close.name: DEEP SLEEP
market_close.result: Fresh in the morning, ready to trade.

morning.title: SOS / Anti-Tilt

evening.title: Market Close
evening.description: Disconnecting from market. Delta rhythms for deep recovery.

step1.title: Recognize Trigger
step1.description: Tilt, FOMO, or exhaustion? Choose protocol for situation or let AI detect automatically.

step2.title: Launch Protocol
step2.description: 3-8 minutes. Binaural beats + Whale Voice. Brain biochemistry changes physically.

step3.title: Return to Market
step3.description: Cold head. Clear decision. No emotions.

voiceClone.title: Whale Voice 2.0
voiceClone.description: Not your voice — the voice of someone who manages billions. Low timbre, no emotions, pure authority. Subconscious obeys automatically.

ai.title: Contextual Protocols
ai.description: AI creates programs for specific situations: stop-loss, FOMO, exhaustion. Hard commands instead of mantras.

binaural.title: Frequency Shift
binaural.description: Alpha 10Hz for grounding, Theta 6Hz for sleep, Gamma 40Hz for focus. Brain mode switch in 3-8 minutes.

science.title: It's Not Magic, It's
science.description: Binaural beats aren't esoteric. It's physics: two tones with frequency difference create a third tone in the brain that synchronizes hemispheres.
science.point1: Binaural beats synchronize brain hemispheres in 8-10 minutes
science.point2: Alpha waves (10Hz) reduce cortisol and activate parasympathetic system
science.point3: Authoritative voice activates trust zones in subconscious
science.videoTitle: How does it work? Neuroscientist explains

pricing.title: How Much Does Your Mistake Cost?
pricing.anchor: One tilt trade with leverage = $500-5000. MindFrame subscription = one trade commission.
pricing.roi: If MindFrame stops you from one stupid move per year — 50x ROI.

referral.title: SHARE ALPHA.
referral.description: Have a friend or chat where people lose money on panic? Give them the pill.
benefits: Save a friend from liquidation — earn

footer.disclaimer: MindFrame does not provide financial advice. We provide tools for preserving sanity so you can make decisions yourself. This is not a medical device.
